body:
Comment 14: 
Added golang-issues-5306.txt with information you asked for.

Also, I forgot to mention that I just today changed the safe_store.go code
and now I don't see the hang anymore.

I still think there is some issue hiding somewhere there.

I've attached the old safe_store.go now, hoping it triggers some idea.

Like I mentioned before, I can't reproduce these standalone. I only see it when
run within my application.

Sorry if I sound hasty - have to rush off for my niece baseball game. Hope this 
gives you something to start with.

Thanks.
Attachments: 1. safe_store.go__04052013_104845.bak.go (7003 bytes) 1. golang-issue-5206.txt (18658 bytes)
